documents: Blue-green deployments require validating both target groups before traffic cutover.
Rollback should be triggered if p95 latency increases more than 20 percent.
Start with pg_stat_activity to inspect long-running queries.
Check IOPS and CPU graphs before changing indexes.

documents: Prioritize rollback over config edits during active incidents.
Only attempt partial mitigation after rollback feasibility is evaluated.
